title: Send tokens or SFTs to multiple addresses
what_to_send: What do you want to send?
tooltip: Select the SFT or ESDT to send.
default_qty_tooltip: The default quantity for each address. (Unless specified in the address list.)
decimals_tooltip: ESDTs are divisible up to 18 decimal places. This value is defined by the creator of the ESDT.
decimals_yes_no_tooltip: Quantities will be automatically adjusted based on the ESDTâ€™s decimal precision. Uncheck this box to manually enter amounts with decimal values.
list_of_addresses_tooltip: Paste the list of addresses to send the ESDT or SFT to. Separate each address with a newline or semicolon. You can set a specific amount for each address by adding an amount after the address.
addresses_placeholder:
Paste the addresses here:
 erd17gzyp....lskyy74q036l6h 
 You can set a quantity for each address:
 erd1.... 10 
 erd1.... 5
dino_stakers_tooltip: Check this box to include dino stakers. (SC only)
box_holders_tooltip: Check this box to include holders of the box. (wallet only)
vox_holders_tooltip: Check this box to include dinovox holders. (wallet only)
